headline: UFC CEO Dana White & Polymarket CEO Shayne Coplan on new partnership: This deal made a lot of sense
summary: Dana White, UFC president and CEO, and Shayne Coplan, Polymarket founder and CEO, joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss details of the multiyear deal between TKO and Polymarket to integrate prediction markets into UFC and Zuffa Boxing events, integration of prediction markets into future sporting events, UFC's media rights deal with Paramount, sports betting scandals, plans for an UFC event at the White House, and more.

raw.headline: UFC CEO Dana White & Polymarket CEO Shayne Coplan on new partnership: This deal made a lot of sense
raw.summary: Dana White, UFC president and CEO, and Shayne Coplan, Polymarket founder and CEO, joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss details of the multiyear deal between TKO and Polymarket to integrate prediction markets into UFC and Zuffa Boxing events, integration of prediction markets into future sporting events, UFC's media rights deal with Paramount, sports betting scandals, plans for an UFC event at the White House, and more.

headline: TKO, Polymarket strike multiyear deal to integrate prediction markets into UFC events
summary: The deal makes UFC and Zuffa Boxing the first sports organizations to incorporate prediction market technology into live events.

raw.headline: TKO, Polymarket strike multiyear deal to integrate prediction markets into UFC events
raw.summary: The deal makes UFC and Zuffa Boxing the first sports organizations to incorporate prediction market technology into live events.
